heading: Notification and transmission of information
text:
The department of finance shall:
    1.    Annually notify owners of covered buildings of their obligation to benchmark pursuant to section 28-309.4, provided that
         the failure of the department of finance to notify any such owner shall not affect the obligation of such owner to benchmark
         pursuant to such section.

   2.    Notify owners of covered buildings of any suspension or lifting of a suspension pursuant to section 28-309.6.

   3.    Make available to the department information regarding owners of covered buildings for which no benchmarking
         information was generated by the benchmarking tool.
